sourcesContent: import {Component, Input, OnInit} from '@angular/core'; import {ISummary} from "../interfaces/cv-interfaces"; @Component({ selector: 'app-carousel', templateUrl: './carousel.component.html', styleUrls: ['./carousel.component.css'] }) export class CarouselComponent implements OnInit { @Input() carouselData: Array public currentSummary: ISummary; public ngOnInit(): void { this.currentSummary = this.carouselData[0]; } public changeSummary(): void { const currentIndex: number = this.carouselData.indexOf(this.currentSummary); if(currentIndex >= this.carouselData.length) { this.currentSummary = this.carouselData[0] } else { this.currentSummary = this.carouselData[(currentIndex+1)] } } } //https://www.google.com/url?sa=t&rct=j&q=&esrc=s&source=web&cd=&cad=rja&uact=8&ved=2ahUKEwi9q5yq95_-AhUNHcAKHZsTBdEQFnoECGAQAQ&url=https%3A%2F%2Fmedium.com%2Fshowpad-engineering%2Fangular-animations-lets-create-a-carousel-with-reusable-animations-81c0dd8847e8&usg=AOvVaw1ZRR7pAR_Gb1stB5EnwZJR
